description:
Kyle auditioned with me a while back. He told me that his fantasy was to blindfold a hot, muscular, young straight guy and then just work him over from head to toe.
So, I asked Dylan if he would be interested. At first he didn't want to, but then he decided that the idea of lying back and getting a massage and a blow job wasn't so bad... as long as he didn't have to reciprocate (you know how straight guys are).
This is some serious footage of a straight muscle boy getting sucked off by a guy for the first time. Kyle gives him a nice long massage and then goes down on him. The most surprising part is when Kyle starts kissing his back and then puts his face in Dylan's ass. I wasn't sure how Dylan was going to respond, but he didn't seem to mind.
Kyle really enjoyed himself... and so did I. I had a stiffy in my pants the whole time.
title: Massaging Dylan
